title: The Grandson
occurrences: Well... my son, daughter in law, and my grandson.
- Rudolf is your grandson, right? - Yes. Why what happened'?
Your grandson didn't give right-of-way. A BMW side-swiped him.
Your grandson's car insurance came up invalid.
- With your grandson at fault. - But... then...
Don't you disappear on me. We're going to help your grandson.
We'll send a patrol car to help you get to your grandson. Your address please?
- We 'll help your grandson. - Thank you so much.
How do you think he knew your grandson's name?
Morning, sir. I'm Mr. Recz's grandson and I'd like to...
- You can help your grandson... - How could you believe him?
Your grandson was caught driving drunk early this evening,
It's a hefty sum but you'll get it all back when your grandson shows up in court.
This is Domi, my little grandson.
My grandson visits today, he always gets a goodie bag.
My grandson brought me one, it's just sitting there, I can't even turn it on.
My grandson gave it to me, you know the one...
You mean I know your grandson?
I bet your grandson's working day and night. |t's hard to meet people like that.
My sweet little grandson...
